text:
SwiftPoint is an application designed for the management of both principal and agency, which enables them to keep track of the field forces' attendance and activities, and monitor inventory in real-time across all stores.

Revolutionize your workforce management with our app!
- Effortless Attendance: Say goodbye to manual tracking. Easily record time-in, time-out, breaks, leaves, itineraries, and work schedule changes.
- Store Data Fields: Take control of your store performance. Track inventory, availability, Share-of-Shelf, freshness, sellout, and define carried items per store effortlessly.
- Trade Activities Monitoring: Stay one step ahead of the competition. Monitor promo item allocation, implementation, and keep tabs on competitor activities.
- Customizable Forms: Streamline your paperwork and administrative tasks. Create tailored survey questions for expense reports, reimbursements, and more.
You need internet during download & initial log in, but you can use it even when you are offline
No, your username is locked to the phone where you have initialy logged in. To be able to use a different phone, contact your Admin to reset your device id

You need to enable these settings in your device: 
    1. Wi-Fi or Mobile Data, 
    2. Location Service, and 
    3. Automatic Date and Time
Contact your Admin to have it reset. Once it has been reset, use your company's default password. Then you can enroll your new password
Make sure that you perform sync today. If yes, please request your coordinator to check via portal if the name of the outlet is set as ACTIVE.
Turning on the wi-fi will help your device capture a more accurate GPS location. Simply enable the wi-fi without connecting to a hotspot, then log in offline.
Yes, you can still capture your time-in even if there is no available internet connection.
You cannot time in to a Store that is not part of the list of Stores in your SwiftPoint. Contact your Admin to have the store added to your Store list.
Check first with your Admin if your company policy allows this. If yes, then your Admin can simply activate the "Duty on Day-off" (DoD) setting from the web tool.
Connect to the internet and synchronize your device. If it is still not reflecting, contact your Admin and check if they have mapped the SKU to your store

You can check the Inventory Reports Module. Tap the vertical ellipsis  to select the cycle that you want to view. 

"Note that the viewable past transactions is dependent on Data Retention settings for your company."
Yes, you may still edit and send an updated inventory transaction.

If you cannot sync successfully, follow these steps: 

1. Restart the device, and retry sync. 
2. Go to Utilities > Check Connectivity
3. If the Average Latency value is 400ms and up, this is a possible indication of slow connectivity. Try to use another internet connection or mobile data.
     3.1. If the Average Latency value is zero, it means you do not have an internet connection.
     3.2. If the Average Latency value is between 1 ms and 400 ms, retry sync.
     3.3. If all fails, make a screenshot of the error and report it via email (edtrsupport@electronicscience.net)
If you can see the Not Carried Module, you may use it to tag SKUs as NOT CARRIED so the product list will show only those SKUs you need in Inventory, OSA, SOS and Near Expiry modules.

If you can see the Not Carried Module, you may use it to tag SKUs as NOT CARRIED by following this procedure: 
1. Go to 'Not Carried' module. 
2. Choose a store
3. Select SKUs and toggle switch (set to OFF) 
4. Synchronize to save changes

If you keep on getting zero coordinates or 0,0 location, you may: 
1. Tap Attendance> 3 dots > Refresh GPS
2. Go to Google Maps> Check if there is location, then go back to EDTR and Refresh location
3. Go to Phone's settings > Application manager > Tap EDTR > Force Stop
4. Restart device.
5. Open EDTR > Login with Login Online box checked.
6. Go to Menu > Utilities > Send Error Report.
7. Go to Menu > Utilities > Check connectivity and send us the screenshot.
Please make sure to SYNCHRONIZE successfully first before downloading the update from Playstore.

Are you seeing the error "You are xxx meters away from the store. Your attendance will be part of the Exception Report if you time-in outside the allowable radius of xxx meters. Would you like to proceed?"

To confirm your location: 
1. Get your current location in the Time In / Time Out Screen. Click Option > Refresh Location.
2. To validate location, click Option > Validate Location. Google Maps app will show. The red pin and blue dot should be located on the map closely. 
3. If the issue is persistent, make a screenshot based on step #2 and report it to your supervisor, or edtrsupport@electronicscience.net
Double check your username and password. Make sure that there are no blank spaces in between.

Kindly follow the instructions below:

1. Tap UTILITIES > Send error report
2. Once done, go to the phone's settings > Application Manager > Select EDTR > tap Force Stop.
3. Tap the Recent App key on the left side of the device's home button
4. Close all applications
5. Restart device
6. Open eDTR and try logging in again by entering the password and with the "Login Online" box checked.

Also, please make sure you have a stable internet connection.

1. Go to Phone's settings > Application manager > Tap SwiftPoint > Force Stop
2. Restart device.
3. Open SwiftPoint > Login with Login Online box checked.
4. Go to Menu > Utilities > Send Error Report.

FOR ANDROID:
Go to Play Store > Search for Swiftpoint

FOR IOS:
You may search "pocketwise edtr+" in App Store or click this link: https://apps.apple.com/ph/app/pocketwise-edtr/id1486508682
Contact your Admin to ask for your user credentials
Upon successful login, go to the Leave module. Tap [REQUEST LEAVE] button and then fill up the details. Once completed, tap [SEND].
Upon successful login, tap the Options (3 dots) icon > Synchronize. Make sure that you have stable internet connection when using this feature.

SwiftPoint is an application designed for the management of both principal and agency, which enables them to keep track of the field forces' attendance and activities, and monitor inventory in real-time across all stores.

Revolutionize your workforce management with our app!
- Effortless Attendance: Say goodbye to manual tracking. Easily record time-in, time-out, breaks, leaves, itineraries, and work schedule changes.
- Store Data Fields: Take control of your store performance. Track inventory, availability, Share-of-Shelf, freshness, sellout, and define carried items per store effortlessly.
- Trade Activities Monitoring: Stay one step ahead of the competition. Monitor promo item allocation, implementation, and keep tabs on competitor activities.
- Customizable Forms: Streamline your paperwork and administrative tasks. Create tailored survey questions for expense reports, reimbursements, and more.

Please follow these steps: 

1. Press “Tap here to select store”
and choose a store from the list
2. Make sure that your schedule is
correct
3. Tap “Add Picture” to take a picture
4. Select Reason (Optional)
5. Enter Remarks (Optional)
6. Tap TIME IN and tap YES on the
Confirmation box

Kindly follow the steps below: 
1. Go to Attendance. 
2. (State should be you are currently Timed In). Click [TIME OUT].
3. Click [CAMERA] icon and then take a selfie.
4. Click [TIME OUT].

Kindly synchronize or follow the below steps to re-sync the app. 
1. Tap UTILITIES > Send error report
2. Once done, go to the phone's settings > Application Manager > Select EDTR > tap Force Stop.
3. Tap the Recent App key on the left side of the device's home button
4. Close all applications
5. Restart device
6. Open eDTR and try logging in again by entering the password and with the ""Login Online"" box checked.

Kindly synchronize or follow the below steps to re-sync the app. 
1. Tap UTILITIES > Send error report
2. Once done, go to the phone's settings > Application Manager > Select EDTR > tap Force Stop.
3. Tap the Recent App key on the left side of the device's home button
4. Close all applications
5. Restart device
6. Open eDTR and try logging in again by entering the password and with the ""Login Online"" box checked.
For Android users - At least Android v9 with 2GB RAM
Kindly contact your Admin to reset your device id. If Admin will not be able to reset the Device ID for you, kindly provide the following information so that an agent may assist you.
eScience grew out of a passion for innovation and mobile technology. To learn more about us, please visit our website at: https://www.electronicscience.com/index.html
